name: Sudoku Addicted
description:
Play a Sudoku where ever you are and enjoy the incredible feature set! This is not another Sudoku, it is the best Sudoku game on the app store. It focuses on the Sudoku only. No fancy graphic, no unneeded effects, just unlimited possibilities with an unlimited number of Sudoku games!

With the integrated Sudoku generator, you get every time a new Sudoku with just one single solution. You say how complex the Sudoku game is, and what help the game should give you. Choose between four difficulty levels and activate the helpers you want.

You know you did a mistake in the Solution? Just try the function to remove wrong numbers, and continue to do the right solution! Don't like the game you play? Just create a new Sudoku - you can come back later, and finish every generated Sudoku later.

But that is not all! Check out the complete feature list:

- Focuses on the Sudoku only
- Puzzle generator for unlimited play
- Every Sudoku has a single solution
- Four difficulty levels
- Two different input modes
- Input multiple numbers per field
- Game statistics (including charts)
- Game timer
- Tools to remove wrong numbers, or clear the board to restart the game
- History of all generated Sudokus
- Retina ready!
- Directly resume the last game when starting the app
- Game helpers for easier game solving
- Universal App for iPhone and iPad
- Localized to english and german

Sudoku is a logic-based, combinatorial number-placement puzzle (Wikipedia).
